job_description:
• Maintain the integrity of the QMS/business process during planned changes, ensuring customer requirements are met.
• Experience with basic automation (excel, tableau, RPA (Robotic Process Automation), or python) Minimum of one year of experience working with Process Change Review Board in HVM environment Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.
• Prior experience with Micron strongly preferred 2 years of semiconductor experience Semiconductor industry experience Fab Support Manufacturing Engineering Senior Lead EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 17 days ago Engineer / Senior Engineer, Global Facilities - ElectricalBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 19 days ago Engineer / Senior Engineer, Global Facilities - ElectricalBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 23 days ago.
